# partycodesbr

This is a simple one-function package to supply TSE political party codes.

## Installation

You can install partycodesbr with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("BrazilianPublicData/partycodesbr")
```

## Usage

```{r eval = FALSE}
tse_codes()
```
